heading: Wednesday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Rain, mixing with or changing to snow north and in the southern Greens, with 1 to 3 inches in the hills, and a dusting possible in the north at lower elevations outside the broad valleys. Lows from the upper 20s to mid 30s. West to northwest winds gusting to 40 mph near and north of Route 4, and to 55 mph south of Route 4.

heading: Thursday
text: Mostly sunny in southern valleys. Mostly to partly cloudy north, and in the southern mountains, with morning snow showers tapering off. Valley highs from the upper 30s to mid 40s north, and mid to upper 40s in the south. Northwest winds 10 to 20 mph, gusting to 40 mph in the morning.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Any snow or rain showers likely north, chance to the south. Lows in the 20s to near 30. Winds becoming west to southwest 5 to 10 mph.
